projects.title: SofiaXT - WhatIf
projects.description: Tool that allows students to create essays based on historical cases, where they must defend their positions using well-reasoned arguments. The process involves teamwork, with each team member writing an individual essay and ultimately contributing to a collaborative group essay. Two teams are formed, each taking opposing stances—either in favor or against a given topic—fostering critical thinking and debate skills.
projects.challenge: The main challenge for this project was creating an intuitive and user-friendly interface that facilitated seamless collaboration among team members. Ensuring the platform could effectively handle individual and collaborative essay writing, while providing clear visual feedback on team progress.Integrating features like argument structuring, real-time updates, and role-specific permissions posed technical complexities that needed to align with the educational focus of the tool. Achieving a balance between functionality and accessibility was key to delivering an engaging and efficient user experience for students and educators alike.
projects.solution:
The solution was implemented using efficient front-end development practices to ensure seamless functionality and responsiveness. Advanced JavaScript frameworks were used to enable real-time updates and dynamic data handling, allowing students to see immediate feedback on their progress. 
 
 Modular and reusable components were developed to handle individual and collaborative essay submissions, ensuring maintainability and scalability of the codebase. Features like role-specific access and team-based collaboration were integrated with robust state management, providing a smooth and error-free user experience. This front-end approach ensured the platform was not only visually engaging but also technically robust and efficient for handling complex educational workflows.

keyAways.description: Implemented dynamic data handling to ensure seamless real-time collaboration and feedback for students.
Developed modular and reusable front-end components to support future scalability and maintainability.
Integrated role-specific access and permissions, ensuring smooth and efficient workflows for both students and educators.
Focused on responsive design and efficient state management to deliver a fast and error-free user experience across devices.

projects.title: 3Pillar - Telegraph - Newspaper
projects.description: The Telegraph's digital platform is powered by Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), a sophisticated content management system (CMS) designed to handle high-traffic websites and deliver personalized, high-quality user experiences. The system facilitates the creation, management, and distribution of a wide range of content types, including articles, multimedia, and interactive features, while ensuring seamless integration with marketing and analytics tools.
projects.challenge: The system provides advertisers with unified, precise, and de-duplicated metrics to understand campaign performance comprehensively. It integrates advanced tools like real-time analytics and audience segmentation, enabling local and regional advertisers to maximize their campaigns' reach and effectiveness.
projects.solution:
The Telegraph’s digital platform was enhanced with interactive tools that allowed users to provide feedback on content through ratings and comments, enabling the collection of real-time insights on audience preferences.

These tools helped measure user sentiment and engagement, offering valuable data for optimizing content strategies. The system also supported seamless integration with marketing and analytics tools to personalize the user experience, while maintaining high performance with fast load times and compatibility across devices. Built with Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), the solution ensured a smooth content management workflow for articles, multimedia, and interactive features.

keyAways.description: Developed interactive features for users to rate and comment on content, providing real-time insights into audience preferences.
Enabled data collection to measure user sentiment, supporting data-driven improvements to content strategies.
Integrated marketing and analytics tools to personalize user experiences and drive engagement.
Ensured fast loading times, cross-device compatibility, and smooth content management workflows using Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)

projects.title: 3Pillar - CSM - Report System
projects.description: The Cross Screen Media reporting system is a robust analytics platform designed to measure and optimize advertising campaigns across multiple channels, including Connected TV (CTV), linear TV, and digital platforms.
projects.challenge: The main challenge of this project was unifying and deduplicating data from diverse platforms, including CTV, linear TV, and digital channels, to provide advertisers with actionable insights. Ensuring real-time analytics, accurate audience segmentation, and seamless integration across systems required innovative solutions to optimize campaign performance and support data-driven decision-making.
projects.solution:
The solution for the Cross Screen Media reporting system was designed to deliver a seamless and intuitive user experience for advertisers managing campaign performance across multiple platforms.

The interface provides clear, data-driven visualizations such as audience reach graphs and performance metrics, enabling users to quickly analyze key trends. Interactive elements, like filters for markets and baselines, allow advertisers to customize their views and access actionable insights in real-time.

The design prioritizes usability, with a responsive layout and organized data tables that streamline navigation and decision-making, ensuring users can efficiently optimize their advertising strategies.

keyAways.description: Streamlined data from CTV, linear TV, and digital platforms for comprehensive performance analysis.
Intuitive design with interactive filters, responsive layouts, and clear data visualizations.
Integrated analytics tools provide up-to-date audience segmentation and campaign performance metrics.
Built to accommodate local and regional advertising needs with adaptability for various markets.
Facilitates media planning with precise, de-duplicated metrics and streamlined workflows.

projects.title: SofiaXT - QualifyXT
projects.description: A comprehensive tool designed specifically for teachers, providing robust features to effectively manage student groups, assign tasks, and customize grading methods according to their needs. This tool also enables educators to streamline the process of generating detailed grade reports, offering insights into the performance of each student within their respective groups. By simplifying these essential tasks, it helps teachers save time, stay organized, and focus more on delivering quality education.
projects.challenge: The challenge of this project was to develop a dynamic and responsive interface that seamlessly handled complex functionalities such as group management, task assignments, and customized grading systems. Real-time data updates required efficient implementation to ensure smooth interactions for users. Creating flexible tools for grading customization and integrating them with detailed performance reporting systems added another layer of complexity, demanding a scalable and maintainable approach. Ensuring the platform was intuitive, efficient, and accessible across various devices was critical to supporting the diverse needs of educators.
projects.solution:
The solution involved creating a dynamic and interactive interface that allowed educators to easily configure grading rubrics for each evaluation period. The development process focused on building modular components capable of handling real-time updates and user inputs, such as adding, editing, and weighting categories.

Smooth navigation was ensured through a clean layout with intuitive controls, like toggles for extra points and responsive data tables. State management was optimized to handle complex interactions without compromising performance, while ensuring seamless integration with backend systems for storing and retrieving configuration data. This approach provided educators with a flexible and user-friendly tool to simplify their grading workflows.

keyAways.description: Developed an intuitive interface for educators to create, edit, and weight grading categories for each evaluation period in real-time.
Implemented reusable and scalable components to streamline development and ensure maintainability across the platform.
Integrated interactive features, such as toggles for extra points and responsive data tables, to simplify complex grading workflows.
Ensured smooth handling of real-time updates and user inputs while maintaining high performance and responsiveness.
Facilitated efficient data storage and retrieval for grading configurations, ensuring accurate synchronization between the front-end and backend systems.
